wikipedia_page.main: William Douglas Slade (27 September 1941 – 22 December 2019) was a Welsh cricketer. Slade was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm medium pace. He was born at Briton Ferry, Glamorgan.

link_mentions.page: List of Glamorgan County Cricket Club players
